short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ultimate All-In-One Software for Resellers!

Streamline your reselling business by managing your inventory, optimizing product…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ultimate All-In-One Software for Resellers!

Streamline your reselling business by managing your inventory, optimizing product placement, and accessing advanced analytics—all in one platform completely for free!

Get Started with Your Inventory

Easily import your existing listings from top marketplaces or create new ones from scratch with Closo. Start crosslisting in just a few clicks!

Free Crosslister with AI
Expand your reach by crosslisting your inventory to popular platforms like Poshmark, eBay, and more.

Marketplace Access
Unlock brands’ excess and returned products with seamless crosslisting into your stores. Pay only after the order is successfully delivered!

Auto-Curator & Auto-Lister
Closo AI analyzes your best-selling products and automatically lists similar items in your store.

Auto-Sharing & Auto-Offering
Closo takes care of your closet by sharing your listings and sending personalized offers 24/7 to everyone who has shown interest. Powered by AI-driven demand matching, Closo analyzes market trends and sends exclusive, tailored offers to maximize your sales.

Real-Time Market Analytics
Efficient selling starts with understanding current demand. Our chart highlights the top-performing categories, price ranges, brands, and colors based on the highest value of products sold over a specific period, giving you the insights you need to source smarter
